course_title: Land, Food, and Community III: Leadership in Campus Food System Sustainability

001.comments: - MCML 160 is the primary classroom; other rooms will be used throughout the term for breakouts and group work.- LFS 450 has been blocked from registration. Please register onto the Waitlist to be considered for the course.

description: Design, analysis, recommendation or implementation of solutions in response to a food sustainability issue faced by community partners. Emphasis is on professional communication, leadership development, project management and decision-making skills.
